corvusFacts.output:
Corvus Fun Fact #1:

Ravens and crows (corvids) are among the most intelligent birds.
They can solve complex puzzles, use tools, and even plan for future events.

Just like how we approach web development - with intelligence,
creativity, and forward-thinking solutions.

Did you know? Ravens can learn to mimic human speech better than
many parrots! üê¶‚Äç‚¨õ

Intelligence Level: MAXIMUM

Corvus Fun Fact #2:

Crows have been observed making and using tools in the wild.
They craft hooks from twigs to extract insects from bark.

This tool-making ability mirrors our approach to development -
crafting the right tools and solutions for each unique challenge.

A group of crows is called a "murder" - but we prefer to call
our team a "problem-solving collective" üòÑ

Tool Mastery: LEGENDARY

Corvus Fun Fact #3:

Ravens can live up to 20+ years and form lifelong partnerships.
They're known for their loyalty and complex social structures.

At Corvus, we believe in building lasting relationships with our
clients and creating digital solutions that stand the test of time.

Ravens also play in the snow and perform aerial acrobatics
just for fun - because work should be enjoyable too! ‚ö°

Partnership Level: ETERNAL
